channel.title: Meetings on Welsh Technical Standards Board
channel.description: Recent content in Meetings on Welsh Technical Standards Board

item.description: Agenda Standards for developers To be confirmed

item.title: Virtual meeting to draft letter following statement of principles
item.description: Agenda Discussion of draft letter call-for-action after statement of principles have been endorsed by National Informatics Management Board (NIMB) - See shared document (standards board members only)

item.title: Electronic prescribing standards and statement of principles sign-off
item.description: Agenda Minutes and Actions from February meeting - see link or Document 1 in bundle Presentation from e-prescribing team Discussion ahead of National Informatics Management Board (NIMB) – 11 April NIMB consideration of Statements of Principles - Doc 2 Any other business

item.title: Statement of intent, community integration and work plans
item.description: Agenda Final discussions and sign off of statement of intent Discussion of community and social care integration and interoperability standards Consideration of new document detailing resources and requirements for work packages Review of website / blog and API documentation

item.title: Terms of reference / developers / GDS
item.description: Welcome & introductions Action Log - Doc 1 Updated Terms of Reference for sign off - Doc 2 Discussion relating a developer/standards portal e.g. https://developer.wales.nhs.uk or https://standards.cymru Current Standards in use across NHS Wales – Rob Jones, Doc 3a,b,c Proposed standards for consideration, Doc 4a,b GDS Design Principles GDS Service Standards e-Observations NHS Wales System Architecture Review - Doc 5 AOB Date of next meeting: 10:00-12:30 - 17th July
